WILL
OF
FENG  K U A N G LIU
I, FENG  K U A N G LIU, a resident  of Santa Clara County,
C a l i f o r n i a , declare  that this  is m y Will.
FIRST: I revoke  all  wills  a n d codicils  that  I have
p r e v i o u s l y made.
SECOND: I am not  married. I have two (2) children,
namely KARENPELING  L I U and KENNY  PENG  LIU, both over the age of
m a j o r i t y. I have  no d e c e a s e d children.
THIRD: It is m y intention b y this  Will to dispose o f my
p r o p e r t y which I may own at m y death.
FOURTH: I give  all  of m y estate  t o the  T r u s t e e s named as
Trustees  o f that  c e r t a i n Trust Agreement d e s i g n a t e d as  the  FENG
KUANG  LIU  "A"  T R U S T , established o n March 1 4 , 2005, o f which I am
the Tr u s t o r. I direct  that  all  of m y estate  s h a l l be added to,
a d m i n i s t e r e d t o , and d i s t r i b u t e d as part of that Trust Agreement,
a c c o r d i n g t o the  terms  of that  Trust Agreement a n d a n y amendments
made t o it before  m y death. To t h e extent  p e r m i t t e d by law, it
is not m y intent  t o create  a separate  t r u s t by this  Will  o r to
subject  the Tr u s t Agreement of the p r o p e r t y added to it by this
Will t o the  j u r i s d i c t i o n o f the  probate  court.

--- Page 2 ---
FIFTH: If the d i s p o s i t i o n s e t forth in Paragraph FOURTH,
above, is not operative  or is i n v a l i d for any reason, or if the
Trust Agreement r e f e r r e d t o in P a r a g r a p h F O U R T H fails  o r has been
revoked, thenI h e r e b y incorporate  by reference  the  terms  of that
Trust A g r e e m e n t , without  g i v i n g effect  t o any amendments made
s u b s e q u e n t l y , and I give  all  of m y estate  t o the  T r u s t e e named in
that Trust Agreement as Trustee to be held, a d m i n i s t e r e d and
d i s t r i b u t e d as  p r o v i d e d i n t h a t instrument.
SIXTH: I nominate m y ﬁancé, M E I LIANG  MELODY  TSAI, as
Executor of this Will, to serve without b o n d . I f M E I LIANG
MELODY  TSAI fails  to act o r ceases to act  as Executor, I nominate
m y daughter, KAREN  PELING LIU, to serve as Executor of this  Will.
I f KAREN  PELING LIU fails  t o act or ceases  t o act as  E x e c u t o r , I
nominate m y son, KENNY  PENG  LIU, to serve  as Executor of this
Will. The term "my• Executor"  as  used in this  Will shall  include
a n y personal  representative  of m y e s t a t e . N o b o n d shall  be
r e q u i r e d of any p e r s o n named as  E x e c u t o r of this  Will.
I authorize  m y Executor t o s e l l , w i t h or without n o t i c e , at
e i t h e r p u b l i c or private  s a l e , and to l e a s e p r o p e r t y b e l o n g i n g to
m y e s t a t e , subject  o n l y t o such c o n ﬁ r m a t i o n of court  as  may be
r e q u i r e d by law. I further authorize  m y Executor to invest and
reinvest  any surplus  funds in every kind of p r o p e r t y and every
kind of investment which persons  of p r u d e n c e , d i s c r e t i o n , and
intelligence  acquire  f o r t h e i r own accounts.
2

--- Page 3 ---
SEVENTH: As  used in this  w i l l , the  m a s c u l i n e , feminine, or
n e u t e r g e n d e r, and the  s i n g u l a r or plural  number, shall  each be
d e e m e d t o include  the  others  w h e n e v e r the  context  s o indicates.
EIGHTH: I have  not  e n t e r e d i n t o a contract  t o make wills  or
a contract  not t o revoke  wills.
I s u b s c r i b e m y name  t o this  will  this  dothday of
May 2 0 0 7 , at  C i t y of S a n Jose,California.
TongFENG KUANG LIU
O n the d a t e w r i t t e n below, FENG  KUANG  LIU, d e c l a r e d to us,
the undersigned, that this  instrument, consisting of four (4)
pages, including the page signed by us as w i t n e s s e s , was the Will
o f FENG  KUANG  LIU and requested us  t o act  as  witnesses  t o i t . He
t h e r e u p o n s i g n e d this  Will in our p r e s e n c e , all  of us being
present at  the same time. We  now , at his request, in his
presence, and i n the presence o f each other, subscribe our names
as  witnesses.
